name: advertising-sdk
description: This is the Advertising sdk for Nordic Game LLC websites

scripts.build:
npx tsc && mkdir dist && npx uglifyjs ts/ads.js --module --compress --mangle -o dist/ads.min.js --source-map "url='https://static.nordicgamelab.org/v1/ads.min.js.map'" && echo "$(echo -n '/**
* @license Copyright (c) 2024 Nordic Game Lab LLC
* You may not use this code without the express permission in writing of Nordic Game Lab LLC.
*/
'; cat dist/ads.min.js)" > dist/ads.min.js

author: Nordic Game Lab LLC
